trans-unit.source: Provides a control array of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" /> controls
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" /> 控件的控件数组

trans-unit.source: The `TimerArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `Timer` control array.
trans-unit.target: `TimerArray`类提供了等效的运行时功能的 Visual Basic 6.0`Timer`控件数组。

trans-unit.source: It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.
trans-unit.target: 它不提供的 Visual Basic 6.0 控件数组的设计时功能。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> 命名空间中的函数和对象是提供给用于将 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 的工具使用的。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray>, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray.SetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.
trans-unit.target: 当实例化<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray>，你还必须调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray.SetIndex%2A>方法创建的初始元素数组中。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> 命名空间中的函数和对象是提供给用于将 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 的工具使用的。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" /> where the control array will be hosted.
trans-unit.target: 将在其中承载控件数组的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IContainer" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" /> class, specifying its container.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" /> 类的新实例，并指定其容器。

trans-unit.source: When you instantiate a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray>, you must also call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray.SetIndex%2A> method to create the initial element in the array.
trans-unit.target: 当实例化<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray>，你还必须调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray.SetIndex%2A>方法创建的初始元素数组中。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether a control is a member of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值确定控件是否是 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" /> 的一个成员。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="target" /> is a member of the control array; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="target" /> 是控件数组的一个成员，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `CanExtend` method can be used to determine whether a specific <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer> control is the base element of the control array from which the other elements were cloned.
trans-unit.target: `CanExtend`方法可以用于确定是否可以使用特定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer>控件是控件数组从其克隆其他元素的基本元素。

trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: Overrides <see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.GetControlInstanceType" />.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.GetControlInstanceType" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" /> class is the base class for all control arrays that are used in applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" /> 类是从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级的应用程序中所使用的所有控件数组的基类。

trans-unit.source: Because this class is not typically used to create an instance of the class, this <see langword="Protected" /> method is usually not called directly but is instead called by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 因为该类通常不用于创建类的实例，所以，通常不直接调用此 <see langword="Protected" /> 方法，而是通过派生类调用。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be called from your application's code.
trans-unit.target: 无法从你的应用程序代码调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 请改用 <xref:System.Object.GetType%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" /> in the control array.
trans-unit.target: 控件数组中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" /> in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" /> 中的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Short" /> that represents the index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Short" />，表示指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to retrieve the index for the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用于检索指定的索引<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer>。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Overrides <see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.HookUpControlEvents(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.HookUpControlEvents(System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be called from your application's code.
trans-unit.target: 无法从你的应用程序代码调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Use `AddHandler` to hook up events for any controls that are added by using the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用`AddHandler`挂接事件通过使用添加任何控件<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Short" /> that specifies the position of an element of the control array.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定控件数组元素位置的 <see langword="Short" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a specific element of a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" /> by index.
trans-unit.target: 通过索引获取 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" /> 的特定元素。

trans-unit.source: Read-only.
trans-unit.target: 只读。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" /> at the specified <paramref name="Index" /> in the control array.
trans-unit.target: 位于控件数组中指定 <paramref name="Index" /> 处的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" />。

trans-unit.source: The `Item` property is the default property for a control array.
trans-unit.target: `Item`属性是控件数组的默认属性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the following lines of code are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 因此，以下代码行是等效的。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="ResetIndex" /> method is not supported in the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" /> 类不支持 <see langword="ResetIndex" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported, and calling it does not raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 不支持此方法，并调用它不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" /> in the control array.
trans-unit.target: 控件数组中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Short" /> that represents the index of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Short" />，表示指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: Sets the index of the initial <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" /> in a <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" /> 中的初始 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" /> 的索引。

trans-unit.source: The `SetIndex` method should only be called when you are creating the initial element in the control array.
trans-unit.target: `SetIndex`控件数组中创建的初始元素时，仅应调用方法。

trans-unit.source: To add subsequent elements, call the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A> method and specify the `Index`.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加后续元素，调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.BaseControlArray.Load%2A>方法并指定`Index`。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> 命名空间中的函数和对象是提供给用于将 Visual Basic 6.0 升级到 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] 的工具使用的。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" /> in the control array.
trans-unit.target: 控件数组中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" /> is a member of this <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" />.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Timer" /> 是否为此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray" /> 的成员。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="o" /> is a member of this control array; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="o" /> 是此控件数组的一个成员，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the specified <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer> is a member of a different <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray>, `ShouldSerializeIndex` returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Timer> 是另一个 <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.TimerArray> 的成员，`ShouldSerializeIndex` 则返回 `false`。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the specified timer interval has elapsed and the timer is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 当指定的计时器间隔已过去而且计时器处于启用状态时发生。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 大多数情况下，这些函数和对象可再现 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中其他命名空间的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有 Visual Basic 6.0 代码模型与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 实现有显著区别时才需要这些函数和对象。
